body: Anyone know a good recording software/programme that doesn't affect my Fps so much? I can't really play with huge drops to my Fps :/
body_tagged: Anyone know a good recording software/programme that doesn't affect my Fps so much? I can't really play with huge drops to my Fps :/
title: Recording software/programme

replies.body:
It cuts my Fps to less than half :/
I have a laptop, do you know what settings I should use?
replies.body_tagged:
It cuts my Fps to less than half :/
I have a laptop, do you know what settings I should use?

replies.body: Strange, I use OBS on my laptop - and my FPS isn't touched all that much! Maybe try lowering the output quality.
replies.body_tagged: Strange, I use OBS on my laptop - and my FPS isn't touched all that much! Maybe try lowering the output quality.

reply_to.body:
It cuts my Fps to less than half :/
I have a laptop, do you know what settings I should use?

replies.body:
I use this thing called TinyTake, the free version lets you record up to 5 minutes of footage and changes my frame rate minimally.
Of course, you can't upload directly to YT with the free version, you can still download your recordings then upload to youtube
replies.body_tagged:
I use this thing called TinyTake, the free version lets you record up to 5 minutes of footage and changes my frame rate minimally.
Of course, you can't upload directly to YT with the free version, you can still download your recordings then upload to youtube

has huge video sizes but worth it
also try action

replies.body: Bandicam works very nicely for me :)
replies.body_tagged: Bandicam works very nicely for me :)

replies.body: ScreenFlow is absolutely amazing not sure if there is one for pc though but it doesn't affect fps too much i get still like 100 fps, if anything it helps you have more fps.
replies.body_tagged: ScreenFlow is absolutely amazing not sure if there is one for pc though but it doesn't affect fps too much i get still like 100 fps, if anything it helps you have more fps.

replies.body:
Free: Bandicam-Dxtory-OBS

Also, you can buy the Action! Mirilis, this programme is amazing, it just cut me 5 fps.

replies.body: Are you on Windows 10? If so you can use the inbuilt recording software. It lags my computer less than OBS does, and is really easy to use.
replies.body_tagged: Are you on Windows 10? If so you can use the inbuilt recording software. It lags my computer less than OBS does, and is really easy to use.

replies.body: Whenever you are in a game, press Windows + G at the same time and a bar will pop up. (You can read more about it here.)
